p: Inducible nitric oxide synthase (iNOS) is highly expressed in inflammatory conditions and infections. Thus, it is a vital component of the adaptive response of the host to noxious stimuli. It was reported earlier that Cd-induced renal injury is mediated by nitric oxide synthesis by iNOS stimulation [ 49]. In this study also, Cd exposure was found to cause increased iNOS expression ( Figure 3B), while TSA oil at both doses could significantly reverse iNOS expression in Cd-intoxicated rats.
